name: Cowfinity
description:
A game in which you play the role of a friendly cow-abducting alien.

You start by abducting a cow to bring home for dinner (or whatever aliens do with cows). Your job is to guide the alien's saucer back home with the cow.  Clouds mess with your attraction beam, so if you don't want to lose your meal, you'll have to avoid them.

Get the farthest you can! (And comment your high scores :D)
